rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet reading space with bookshelves, natural light, and a cozy seating area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open living area with views to the garden on one side of the apartment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with integrated appliances and storage units.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large entrance door with glass panel to enhance natural light.

openings.name: Front Balcony
openings.description: Balcony overlooking the street, designed for leisure and outdoor seating.

openings.name: Service Elevator Staircase
openings.description: Stairs leading to utility areas and service elevator access.
